Text:
The information on the site is WRONG.

There are actually seven videos listed on the html page of this torrent:

   1.  Introduction-overview of "the system"

   2. Module 1 - The "R" Word. The real secret to copywriting success

   3. Module 2 - How to profit from social proof

   4. Module 3 - The "Brain Dump". Discover how to get your sales copy or core message written for you without lifting a pen to write a single word yourself.. and NO this does NOT involve hiring a copywriter!

   5. Module 4 - The Right Way To Write Powerful Testimonials That Move People

   6. Module 5 - $29.9 Billion Dollar Writing Secret - use this and watch your sales beat everything you've ever tried before!

   7. Module 6 - How To Structure Your Sales Copy For Highest Conversions

I subscribed to the site and there's an eight video that is not listed anywhere else :/
